transcript_chunks.text: what's up what's up everybody hey Mr and Mrs Whitta I heard she got married today I wanted to pass along my congratulations Colin C you know them pretty well why don't you say something yeah I love you guys well done congratulations to all of you have a good day have a good day it's very professional Mr Whitta it was a pleasure touching your knee Mrs Whitta I look forward to touching your knee as well oh I'm sorry and I also forgot all of Ian wants to say congratulations Beyond
